short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that improves your browsing experience by hiding the numbers of likes, shares and comments on Facebook and Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Social media users are usually influenced by the number of likes, shares and comments on articles and posts. numberless allows you to read articles and posts on their own merit as opposed to the numbers around them. numberless is designed to improve your social media experience by removing features that maybe irrelevant to you.
